title: Under the skin of OnlyFans
description: A BBC investigation reveals concerns about how the site, known for porn, is structured and moderated.

title: In pictures: Floods kill dozens in Germany and Belgium
description: Record rainfall caused rivers to burst their banks, leaving at least 122 dead in Germany and Belgium.

title: Boris Johnson's university friend gets ethics watchdog rule
description: Labour accuses Boris Johnson of "cronyism" but the government says proper processes were followed.

title: Covid infections are high and rising around the UK
description: Cases have risen again in many regions, data reveals, ahead of England dropping most Covid rules on Monday.

title: UK weather: Heat-health alert issued in England for weekend
description: Public Heath England wants people to look out for those who may be at risk in warmer weather.

title: Warnings grow about staff forced to self-isolate
description: Alarm mounts over fears of a "surge" in workers and medical staff forced to quarantine after being "pinged".

title: GB News says presenter Guto Harri breached standards by taking the knee
description: Guto Harri made the gesture on air, saying how "hideously ugly racism in some English football is".

title: Europe floods: At least 120 dead and hundreds unaccounted for
description: Hundreds more are unaccounted for after the worst flooding in decades.

title: Petrol prices at eight-year high, says AA
description: Prices hit the highest since October 2013 amid forecasts of a very busy summer on UK roads.

title: Church of England criticised over suicide of falsely accused priest
description: Fr Alan Griffin took his own life having spent a year under investigation over baseless allegations.

title: Colum Eastwood: MP reveals death threats after naming Soldier F
description: Colum Eastwood named the former paratrooper, accused of two Bloody Sunday murders, in Parliament.

title: Keir Starmer quizzed by former Labour voters in Blackpool
description: The Labour leader speaks to an audience in Blackpool about three of his policy priorities.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Ten tear-jerking moments from the Olympics past
description: It isn't always the big names and blue-riband events that create all the memories. Here are 10 times the Olympics has set spines tingling and tears flowing

title: 'I'm going to Ibiza by any means necessary'
description: The Balearic Islands joining the amber travel list for England is causing a dilemma for some holiday makers.

title: Durham A1 crash: Motorway to stay closed as police fear deaths
description: People are feared dead after a lorry caught fire and cars crashed in County Durham on Thursday.

title: Tokyo Olympics: How quiet rebel Naomi Osaka is changing Japan
description: Naomi Osaka's relationship with Japan has not always been easy, but change rarely is. How the face of the Games is changing the host nation.

title: Covid: Teaching has been 'lonely at times' during pandemic
description: Schools across Wales prepare to close for the summer holidays after "a very complicated year".

title: How are England shaping up for 2022 World Cup in Qatar?
description: Euro 2020 ended in disappointment for England, but another shot at major tournament success is just 16 months away.

title: DeChambeau accused of acting 'like an eight-year-old' after wayward opening day
description: Bryson DeChambeau is accused of "acting like an eight-year-old" by his equipment supplier after the American said his driver "sucks" following his opening round at The Open.

title: Marcus Rashford mural graffiti 'not racial', say police
description: Greater Manchester Police say officers are keeping an "open mind" about the possible motive.

title: Racism in sport: Mo Farah says abuse towards black athletes is getting worse
description: Sir Mo says online trolls should be held to account and tech companies should take more action.

title: The Papers: Britain's 'pingdemic paralysis' amid record alerts
description: Many papers react to the news that the NHS Covid app sent more than half a million alerts in a week.

title: James Norton: Why making Nowhere Special made me sob and want children
description: The Grantchester actor on the emotional toll of playing a dying father and why he doesn't mind fame.

title: Esther Dingley: Partner vows to keep searching for missing hiker
description: The partner of missing hiker Esther Dingley explains why he won't give up searching for her.

title: Finding 'Grace': Murder, DNA and ancestry
description: How a novel use of DNA and ancestry websites is helping police uncover clues in cold case murders.
